name: Max Kenny and the Kingdom of Lost Vegetables
name_original: Max Kenny and the Kingdom of Lost Vegetables
description:
Kingdom of Lost Vegetables is a 2D Platformer created by a team of 4 in the Spring of 2018.  The goal of the team was to just create a fun and creative game that was easily accessible to users.  They expanded their knowledge by really diving into game design elements when it comes to gameplay.  They also explored new mechanics, like wall jumping.

Team:

Max K - Design

Jack M - Design and Art

Michael A - Art

Alessandro L - Programming

Jay L - Programming

How to Play:

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

E to Shoot
